aboutUsPage.solutionDesc: The world's first energy equity product - HeroEE HeroEE is the world's first energy equity product. The product is equipped with a 1-kilowatt-hour battery cell. HeroEE solves the basic electricity needs of energy-poor households. Users can also use our accompanying app to check the battery status in real time and remotely turn the device on and off.
